title: auRa eSports Looking for Plat+ Players
body:
Hey there summoners! With season 4 just finishing up, we're looking for new and dedicated players to join the ranks here at auRa eSports also for our newly created second team.
**


*REQUIREMENTS:*

**- Platinum or higher solo queue rating
- Willing to travel to offline tournaments throughout the year
- Constantly pushing yourself to get better at the game, keeping a professional perspective on the game
- Vocal in-game, even when down. Seriously focusing on the situation, etc
- Using Teamspeak 3 regularly, this means not just coming online for games then leaving but also to relax with the team out of the game. Furthermore able to have a laugh with the team while still having your game face on
- 18+
- Available Sunday-Thursday 740PM-1130PM (auRa eSports) or 
Sunday-Monday 700PM-1130PM and Wednesday-Thursday 900PM-1130PM(auRa eSports Hypanova), including various weekends for tournaments and events, this means that you're able to balance your work/study load
- Able to critique each other in a positive manner and not taking it personally
****


*****ROLES:***

******auRa eSports Hypanova: 
auRa ImpulseZ - Top
OPEN - Jungle
auRa Chokeville - Middle
auRa Hysteria - ADC
Carly - Support**
******
auRa eSports
yeti - Top
dearly beloved - Jungle
Penzki - Middle
Styled - ADC
auRa Snakeboy1 - Support

APPLYING:
If this sounds like you, PM me here on league of legends with this information:

IGN -
Age - 
Location - 
Current rating - 
Role & Champion pool - 
Any competitive experiences prior - 

Or simply add me in-game "auRa Snakeboy1"

Be sure that you are competent enough and meet all of the requirements before following up on a trial. Thanks for taking the time to read, see you in-game summoners!

replies.body:
IGN: WQLFY
Age: 17
Location: Gold Coast
Current rating: Gold IV, but I have played on numerous diamond teams with good succession.
Role and Champ pool: mid/top/jungle (every assassin and numerous poke and cheese orientated laners) I main Kat, Irelia, Yi, Zed, Rengar, Kha'zix
Any competitive experiences prior: Yes

I'll be available all of the next two years since I've already undergone the HSCs.

IGN - Orihalcon
Age - 19
Location - Sydney
Current Rating - Diamond 5
Role & Champion pool - Mid/Adc/Support (every adc, most midlaners, most supports)
Any competitive experiences prior - Yes

-Keith AAron jones
-Rank plat5
-why you should choose me; I've been playing for 4 years league is second nature to me it took one month from silver to plat.
-I take losing and criticism well,
-My play style is passive aggressive, movement is key I will launch myself at the enemy at a moments notice, and back out just as fast
-I am mature and will take this seriously
-Don't underestimate nor discriminate me, in the gaming world where everyone is anonymous, what you do on there is all that matters.
-I'm available after school, I never study but I'm a straight 'A' student, I can handle the weight
-age doesn't matter only skill, I lack only one of those
-Age 14
i am not looking for a adc i am looking for a support or jungle

IGN - Sparkle
Age - 21
Location - New Zealand
Current rating - Plat V
Role & Champion pool - Adc, can play anything
Any competitive experiences prior - Played a bunch of go4lols on na, and I play ranked 5s more than soloq

*I also have a support duo that I've been playing with for a year

IGN - Skyichi
Age - 17(turning 18 on january)
Location - Melbourne
Current rating - Diamond V 50 something LP and currently going up!
Role & Champion pool - ADC ~ Draven, Lucian, Ezreal, Trist, Jinx pretty much any ADC but I prefer Draven when I can
Any competitive experiences prior - Yes but would rather not post that here. (Team captain ended up just afking from life)
Hey man if you're in need of someone to sub for one or both of the teams I'm pretty keen since it's about all I can do because lans are a no go for me, D5 Jungle/Bot lane main.
Unless I missed it you forgot to type the timezone. Im guessing AEST for people tho.

IGN - Intero
Age - 18
Location - Melbourne
Current rating - Plat4 (Highest Plat1)
Role & Champion pool - Support, play every champ but top 3 are thresh janna braum
Any competitive experiences prior - Been on many teams and played in go4lol and melbourne based LAN's
Add ingame for a chat :)
Hey man you deleted me, did I do something wrong? I told you my name and hobbies then deleted me, r00d
DID I GET IN? AM I FAMOUS YET?
Good luck. This is the last place I would look for potential team mates though.
I'm a platonium or higher summoner hmu ya feel bruh
